org.spongepowered.api.event.cause

Interface CauseTracked

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockBreakEvent, BlockBurnEvent, BlockChangeEvent, BlockDispenseEvent, BlockEvent, BlockHarvestEvent, BlockIgniteEvent, BlockInteractEvent, BlockInventoryEvent, BlockMoveEvent, BlockPlaceEvent, BlockRandomTickEvent, BlockRedstoneUpdateEvent, BlockUpdateEvent, BrewEvent, BrewingStandBrewEvent, BrewingStandEvent, BulkBlockEvent, EntityAboutToConstructEvent, EntityBreakBlockEvent, EntityChangeBlockEvent, EntityChangeHealthEvent, EntityCollisionEvent, EntityCollisionWithBlockEvent, EntityCollisionWithEntityEvent, EntityDeathEvent, EntityDropItemEvent, EntityExpireEvent, EntityExplosionEvent, EntityHarvestBlockEvent, EntityInteractBlockEvent, EntityPlaceBlockEvent, EntityPotionEffectChangeEvent, EntityTeleportEvent, FloraGrowEvent, FluidSpreadEvent, FurnaceConsumeFuelEvent, FurnaceEvent, FurnaceSmeltItemEvent, HumanBreakBlockEvent, HumanChangeBlockEvent, HumanChangeHealthEvent, HumanDeathEvent, HumanDropItemEvent, HumanHarvestBlockEvent, HumanInteractBlockEvent, HumanPlaceBlockEvent, ItemExpireEvent, LeafDecayEvent, LivingBreakBlockEvent, LivingChangeBlockEvent, LivingChangeHealthEvent, LivingDeathEvent, LivingDropItemEvent, LivingHarvestBlockEvent, LivingInteractBlockEvent, LivingPlaceBlockEvent, PlayerBreakBlockEvent, PlayerChangeBlockEvent, PlayerChangeHealthEvent, PlayerDeathEvent, PlayerDropItemEvent, PlayerHarvestBlockEvent, PlayerInteractBlockEvent, PlayerPlaceBlockEvent, ProjectileLaunchEvent, SignChangeEvent

    public interface CauseTracked
    Something that keeps track of the cause.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Cause> getCause()
      Get the last cause.

    • Method Detail

      • getCause

        Optional<Cause> getCause()
        Get the last cause.

        Parent causes, including possibly the root cause, can be retrieved using Cause.getParent().

        Returns:
        The last cause
